## Describe the Bug
A concise description of the bug, and what you expected the application to do instead.

## Affected Version(s)
- Which version of Pepp your are running?
  - Open the `About`  dialog, and switch to the  `System Info` tab. Copy the contents into this section.
- Which project type (according to the buttons on the `Welcome` screen) does the error occur in?
  - [ ] Object Code / ISA3 
  - [ ] Assembly Code / ASMB3 /  ASMB5
  - [ ] MA2 / Mc2 / microcode

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots (or videos) to help explain your problem.
For user interface issues, images drastically speed up our ability to solve your problem.

## Reproduction Steps
List out the steps to reproduce the behavior.
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

If you only see the bug on some inputs (e.g., the assembler is producing incorrect error messages), please attach a sample to this issue.

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the problem here.
